title: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman pitches for global plan to aid post-Covid recovery - The Financial Express
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman pitches for global plan to aid post-Covid recovery  The Financial Express
description: The minister met Klaas Knot, chairman of the Switzerland-headquartered Financial Stability Board, an international body that monitors and exchanges views on “dimensions of risk in the crypto eco-system”.
